channel.title: [req] Trimming Stat Icon
channel.description:
I made a prvate server with a trimming skill, and I'm replacing the farming icon with one for trimming, but my trimming icon looks like shit. Can someone make me a beter one? I need the width and height to be right about 20 pixels. Also, make the icon look like it has to do with trimming. Thanks.
Details: Trimming Skill - Using diffrent bars (gold bar on rune fullhelm makes rune fullhelm (g)), etc. Just wanted to be safe and point that out lol
